name: Phish Data
overview: Comprehensive metadata provider for Phish concert videos using the Phish.net API
description: This plugin provides rich metadata for your Phish concert video collection by integrating with the Phish.net API. Features include comprehensive show information with setlists, community ratings from reviews, venue details, band member profiles, and multi-source image provider for venue and show-specific photos. Perfect for organizing and enriching your Phish video library with official show data, fan ratings, and beautiful imagery.

versions.changelog:
## Jellyfin Phish Data Plugin v1.4.6.0

### üìù Error Message & Parsing Fix (Issue #22) - FIXED

#### ‚úÖ Improved Parsing Logic
- Added fallback parsing: tries metadata title first, then filename from path
- Plugin now handles both metadata titles and filenames correctly
- Automatic fallback when metadata title parsing fails

#### ‚úÖ Accurate Error Messages
- Updated error text to reflect actual behavior (title/filename instead of just filename)
- **Prioritizes metadata title editing** (much easier than file renaming!)
- Provides two clear options: edit metadata vs rename file
- Updated UI guidance with step-by-step instructions

#### ‚úÖ Better User Experience
- **Option 1**: Right-click ‚Üí Manage ‚Üí Edit Metadata ‚Üí Change Title *(EASIER)*
- **Option 2**: Rename file *(Alternative)*
- Updated tags from "Needs Rename" to "Needs Title Fix"
- More intuitive and user-friendly error guidance

### üë• Previous Features (v1.4.5.0)
- All 4 Phish band members auto-populate in movie metadata
- Native Jellyfin + IMDB integration for member photos and details
- Type: Actor, Role: Self (matches manual entry format)

### Core Features (Unchanged)
- Smart filename parsing for show identification
- Complete setlists with proper formatting
- Rich show metadata from Phish.net API
- Venue details and location information
- Community ratings and reviews
- Clean text encoding

A significant improvement making error resolution much easier for users!

## Jellyfin Phish Data Plugin v1.4.5.0

### üë• People Population Fix (Issue #12) - FIXED

#### ‚úÖ Band Members Now Auto-Populate
- Added all 4 Phish band members to movie metadata:
  - Trey Anastasio (Guitar, Vocals)
  - Mike Gordon (Bass, Vocals)
  - Jon Fishman (Drums)
  - Page McConnell (Keyboards, Piano, Vocals)
- Jellyfin automatically looks up member details from IMDB
- Type: Actor, Role: Self (matches manual entry format)
- Removed unnecessary PhishPersonProvider for cleaner implementation

### How It Works
- Plugin now adds band members to each concert video automatically
- Native Jellyfin + IMDB integration handles photos, bios, and details
- No manual entry required - works immediately after metadata refresh

### Core Features (Unchanged)
- Smart filename parsing for show identification
- Complete setlists with proper formatting
- Rich show metadata from Phish.net API
- Venue details and location information
- Community ratings and reviews
- Clean text encoding

A major improvement making your Phish video collection even more complete!

## Jellyfin Phish Data Plugin v1.2.9

A comprehensive metadata provider for Phish concert videos:
- Smart filename parsing for show identification
- Complete setlists with proper transitions
- Rich show information from Phish.net API
- Venue details and location metadata
- Proper external links to Phish.net show pages
- Clean text encoding for show notes
- Band member metadata support

Install via Jellyfin plugin catalog or manual installation.
